text: The women's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, at Zawisza Stadion on 20 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Yuliya Gushchina Natalya Ivanova Oksana Gulumyan Tatyana Firova ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jennifer Meadows Danielle Halsall Kim Wall Helen Karagounis ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Eileen Müller Katharina Gröb Tina Kron Claudia Hoffmann ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships – Women's 4 × 400 metres relay
